document_data.mainbody:
uskview House was an inn outside Triel during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Dusvkiew house was located atop a knoll, overlooking Dusk Road.
The place was newly built as of , and had a lounge that was downright palatial. The lounges ceiling was whitedaub, with a dragon motif, and had holes, most likely for peeping.
According to Arauntar, the house was highcoin, that is, expensive, and was likely to sell foodstuffs. The stewards there served alcohol, amongst other amenities. Orthil thought people were almost certainly staying there, strongly implying the place was an inn.
The place was newly built as of .
Late that year, Orthil Voldovans caravan stopped there, looking for reinforcements after suffering a series of ambushes on its way from Scornubel to Waterdeep.
It was said that the inn was raised by Thayan mages.
* Stormshield
